workshop.controllers.internal.rest

Class ClassifierGroupsRestController

  • java.lang.Object
    • workshop.controllers.internal.rest.WorkshopRestControllerAbstract<ClassifiersGroup>
      • workshop.controllers.internal.rest.ClassifierGroupsRestController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    WorkshopRestController<ClassifiersGroup>

    @RestController
 @RequestMapping(path="/internal/classifier-types",
                produces="application/hal+json;charset=UTF-8")
 @ExposesResourceFor(value=ClassifiersGroup.class)
public class ClassifierGroupsRestController
extends WorkshopRestControllerAbstract<ClassifiersGroup>
